text: Ana vahe'mokizmi zamazamo'a kefo avu'ava zama hu' zanteke knarera hu'ne. Gamani eri'za vahemo'zane keagama refko'ma nehaza vahe'mo'za masavema hu'za zagoma zamizage'za eri'zana e'nerize. Ana nehazage'za zamagima me'nea vahe'mo'za, zamagri'ma zamave'nesia zankuke nenekea nehu'za fatgoma huno refkohu avu'ava zana eri rukrahekrahu nehaze.
